special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.
